== Time ==
The Ubuntu Utah meetings are scheduled for the '''second saturday''' of each month from '''6:00pm MST to 8:30pm MST'''

== Location ==
'''University of Utah - Merrill Engineering Building''' <<BR>>
'''50 Central Campus Drive Room 2555''' <<BR>>
'''Salt Lake City, UT 84112.'''
<nowiki>[[http://tinyurl.com/25m7wy|Google Map]]</nowiki>

As always the Ubuntu Utah meetings are open to the public.  We welcome any and all visitors.
